ActJudges Act
SubjectMargaret L. Davison ** Annuity ** The Hon. John M. Davison **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to MARGARET L. DAVISON, survivor of the Hon. John M. Davison, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, effective September 2, 2015.
